title: Get Healthier In 2019 with These 7 Hacks | Health Theory
description: In this episode of Health Theory, Tom shares 7 hacks he’s learned from the world’s leading health experts.   Check out our amazing sponsors! Thrive Market: Get 25% off your first order and a 30-day free trial at thrivemarket.com/health Athletic Greens: Go to Athleticgreens.com/healththeory for a FREE 20 count travel pack and blender bottle (Valued at $99) with any purchase. ButcherBox: Use the discount code: "IMPACT" at butcherbox.com to get 20$ off and FREE BACON   SHOW NOTES Hack #1: Go to bed [00:39] Hack #2: Eat more fat [07:44] Hack #3: Reset your diet [11:17] Hack #4: Test your gut [17:16] Hack #5: Focus on relationships [22:37] Hack #6: Try fasting [28:16] Hack #7: Meditate often [35:21]   Check out the full episodes of each guest: Rangan Chatterjee: https://youtu.be/tfR445ymujk Shawn Stevenson: https://youtu.be/4Mtw3vBQYOg Max Lugavere: https://youtu.be/qplhqCKj_wE Suzanne Ryan: https://youtu.be/JqyVSVGydn8 Dom D’Agostino: https://youtu.be/hu1mF8_QGJE Melissa Hartwig: https://youtu.be/Vi9qU_yPCAg Peter Attia: https://youtu.be/YY-_ux4ZXp4 Carl Lanore: https://youtu.be/BsZKgAxYzgA Naveen Jain: https://youtu.be/cKb7R5zFBpo Steven Gundry: https://youtu.be/q4KfKapvnuI Jimmy Moore: https://youtu.be/qxNWz0KpBok Molly Maloof: https://youtu.be/KpbJhR3nhSE Mind Pump: https://youtu.be/UgQR6DyTE_U Jason Prall: https://youtu.be/VvOu9nAdHdc FOLLOW TOM BILYEU YOUTUBE: https://bit.ly/2iPFwc2 INSTAGRAM: https://bit.ly/2s8adyO FACEBOOK: https://bit.ly/2EmhJhf PODCAST: https://apple.co/2jaPGE1
